name: Euro-Mit Staal B.V.
goal: EMS is specialized in slitting wide coils of the hightest quality of thin gauge grain oriented electrical steel to narrow sized smaller coils. Coils are also cut to laminations suitable for the core of transformers. EMS became operational in 1992 and is located in Vlissingen, The Netherlands.
interests: Climate Action, Customs, Energy, Environment, Trade
euInitiatives: EMS emphasizes that theTrade related to the processing of the materials by the company are of inevitable importance not only for the company itself, but also for the various industries in the community.
